channel.title: Couple of questions involving npc's and stats
channel.description:
ok, how do i edit stats from like they're max..135 to 999etc..
how do i change the bonuses when u go into ur armor like defence bonuses stab +1, but like change att bonuses n stuff
and my last question how do i change what npcs say like if im offline or online and make npcs say diff things

item.title: Couple of questions involving npc's and stats
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

there’s a tut on number 3…
number 2 is in item.cfg
number one is…uh…lemme guess on this one
client.java

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

think that’s it
not sure

Read full topic
item.source: Couple of questions involving npc's and stats
